definition_of_done: Payments failing intermittently en producción. Merchants reporting delays desde ayer.
Daily report inconsistencies. Numbers do not match source system.
Erro no sistema de liquidação. Root cause ainda não clara.
Merchant complaining about manual steps, but no clear incident identified.
Pipeline delay caused missing data in reports.

Integration issue between CRM and Payments. Impacto alto.
Monthly report alignment. Issue resolved after manual fix.
Incident no longer reproducible, but no fix deployed.
Request classified as question, not incident.
Latency above SLA during peak hours. Needs escalation.
Pagos lentos en algunos comercios. No info from IT yet.
Liquidação atrasada para alguns parceiros. Possibly same issue as last week.
